import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Todo } from 'src/app/models/todo'; import { TodosService } from 'src/app/services/todos.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.scss'] }) export class TodoComponent implements OnInit { todo:Todo[]=[] async addTask(Todo:any){ console.log(Todo) return this.todo.push({id:this.todo.length,title:Todo,completed: false}) } async filterTodo(id:number){ this.todo.splice(id) if(id === 0){ console.log('ciao') }else{ console.log('stocazzo') } } constructor() { } @Input() task!:Todo; ngOnInit(): void { } }
